website_summaries.verdict: Very nice price point for a high quality driver from a trusted manufacturing name.
pros: Mass of the driver head is positioned to give you a higher loft off the tee than some other drivers, which is important for less experienced players
Offers a high ball speed for shots that strike the club face a little off-center
cons: Ships with a poor quality head cover
Less effective for low handicap golfers

customer_reviews.title: RBZ black Peffered.
customer_reviews.text: Great Club for the price...tried the Rogue, Taylor M series and by far RBZ black preffered. I am a single digit player and just love this club.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleeve Headcover
customer_reviews.text: Comes with cheap headcover sleeve that doesn’t fit. Called TaylorMade and they said because it’s a special price, that’s the headcover that is included.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy North

customer_reviews.title: Cooooll !!
customer_reviews.text: I Like That It Has A Higher Quality To It & The Golf Shaft Is Stiffer Then The Beginner Driver I Had Been Using So With The Stiffer Golf Club Shaft Im Finding It Easier To Hit !!!! Also Looks Very Cool As Well !!!! I Like I Can Adjust It For A Day I Feel ImBetter On Different Lofts , 1 Day I Might Feel 10.5 Another Day I May Feel Better With Low Loft Or Maybe I Might Go Higher All Depends Very FUN !!!
customer_reviews.author: Sctty569

customer_reviews.title: Smooth driver
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hit driver. It doesn’t have a ton of adjustments like some others, so this is not the club for the golfers that wants to tweak every little adjustment. It does have a loft sleeve adjustment for trajectory. It also has a large face so is very forgiving with plenty of pop to really launch the ball. It’s an easy club to hit.
customer_reviews.author: WG

customer_reviews.title: Nice adjustable club
customer_reviews.text: I was really struggling with my prior club. I order this one and have really enjoyed the feel of the club. So far I hit this club far better than my last one. It is adjustable and I have use the standard and the low loft. I tens to tee the ball on drives higher and the low loft helps in the distance. When I use the Standard I just lower the ball in the tee.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H

customer_reviews.title: Great sweet spot!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size of the sweet spot, it is a major upgrade from my last driver. The driver itself is very lightweight and gives the ball a nice loft.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Distance about the same as my old driver which 15 yrs old. . Hits about the same distance.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Great golf driver.
customer_reviews.text: I have used several brands of golf drivers over the years and the RBZ has proven to be the best for me. As long as you control you hand position, this driver will hit long and straight.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight driver
customer_reviews.text: I just recently began playing golf. Had a starter set that came with a driver. Been playing pretty consistently so I thought I'd upgrade my driver. This driver is so much better than my other one. Obviously its expected but the feel, weight, distance I can get from this driver is awesome. Doing much better and hitting a lot straighter shots with this. Love the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Zavala

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely PERFECT! Taylormade does it again
customer_reviews.text: This club is absolutely amazing, miss hits still travel straight and with distance, it is soooo light you almost feel like you are cheating
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Driver! I Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews on the best drivers for beginner and high handicap golfers and the Taylor Made RBZ was recommended by many so I bought it and I love it! It really is a forgiving club. I hit straighter and farther than I did before. It has a great feel and sounds cool when you hit it! I liked it so much I bought the 3 wood and 4 hybrid to match it!
customer_reviews.author: Al P

customer_reviews.title: Sold by Amazon - Made in Korea
customer_reviews.text: Literally 2 mins after arrival and opening the box, which was COMPLETELY the wrong size and shape to ship a driver in, noticed club was short and thought driver head had been removed. Upon closer inspection club was cleanly snapped and shattered just below the grip. Probably a result of poor packing and handling, but could see the Korean made shaft is not quite up to American specs. Unless someone stepped on it in the box, odd place to break so this doesn't bode well for actual shaft performance on the course. I've asked for a replacement but we'll see. Jury is OUT.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Straightened my Drives
customer_reviews.text: This club has a great feel and puts some power in.
customer_reviews.author: David Dauster

customer_reviews.title: Great driver. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this driver. Hit the ball another 10-15 yards further. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gustino R. Gonnella

customer_reviews.title: Best Value Golf Driver
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t gotten a new driver in 7 plus years. My old driver is a Taylormade R5. Got this one for about $160. I was averaging 250-260 yards with R5. With the RBZ Black I was up to 280 plus. For value and distance, I would get the RBZ black again for sure. Great club.
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic FORGIVING driver, excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This driver was excellent for the price point. I am new to the game of golf and was hesitant about spending hundreds for a driver that would not help my game. $200 has added over 35 yards to my drives, I had been using a hand me down driver that was slicing horribly. This driver and some tweaking of form has added 35+ yards, hitting nice and straight. I don’t think you can find a better driver value than this. I got the 10.5 loft, regular stiffness and think it’s worked great.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best Driver I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after seeing favorable reviews online and watching some professionals test it. I love this thing. By far the driver I have had the most success with. More forgiving that any driver I've used and giving me the most distance I've had. Only thing i do not like about it is it is not available in a longer shaft, but i clearly knew that going in. If you are looking for an affordable driver from a great brand that will help your game, this one may be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before buying it and I am so glad I did. My previous driver was 20+ years old and this is has been a huge improvement without feeling like I am swinging a "potato smasher". Great value for the price, probably could cost twice as much and still sell well.
customer_reviews.author: DMX

customer_reviews.title: Love this driver.
customer_reviews.text: First name brand driver I have ever owned. Hit first shot on driving range straight as an arrow and except for a couple of pull shots have hit it straight every since. Have back problems so I am never going to be a long drive champion but straight drives between 200-250 yards are all I was actually even hoping for and this driver has supplied those aplenty. Would recommend this driver to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Morris

customer_reviews.title: Love this club
customer_reviews.text: Most people feel they need the latest and greatest products. i can absolutely say this driver has change the game of golf for me. it took me awhile to purchase it but i dont know why it took me so long because its perfect. would highly recommend this driver and you dont have to break the bank to buy it compared to other drivers that are name brand
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Good Driver
customer_reviews.text: It took me a few balls to find good head contact / rythm with this one for some reason. I am also teeing the ball lower than with any other T.M. driver I've owned before. Outside of that I'm pleased with the results. For the money it is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Added distance. Feels great to swing.
customer_reviews.text: The furthest I could hit my stock driver from the set of clubs I bought was 250-260. This driver added 25-30 yards to my drives and sounds great when you hit the sweet spot.
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This driver is fantastic. It exceeded my expectations regarding performance and appearance. The headcover that comes with it is really nice, I don’t know why some people complain about it.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Head snapped off after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: The head snapped off after 1 month of light use. Will be contacting the manufacturer but so far very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: swef

customer_reviews.title: Top line driver at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Have played 3 rounds with this driver and was able to hit the fairway 75% of the time (compared to around 50% with a cheaper driver). Great control for a club with a large head, good mix of power an accuracy, very happy with the clubs performance so far and look forward to improving my drive even more with a quality tool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this driver
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in the mail to replace my 20 year old driver. Wow this thing pops. Very accurate and forgiving. Didn’t want to spend a lot of money on a new driver that costs $400 and above. Did some homework and read reviews before I bought and I am glad I did. Love this driver.
customer_reviews.author: JCrrow

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING DRIVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Man this thing DRIVES!!! Added another 50-60 yards to my swing, wasn’t hitting good the first day but next couple times out this club really amazed me. Couldn’t be happier with this purchase! 10.5 regular flex is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Coslett

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my slicing.
customer_reviews.text: I love this club. I'm a beginner and this club has definitely helped my drives. It won't turn you into a pro but definitely helps amateurs. It added a little distance, way more accuracy, and less slicing. These are my experiences they may not be the same for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Still getting use to this new driver. Good value for money. Wish me luck.
customer_reviews.author: Scubamom

customer_reviews.title: Good driver overall
customer_reviews.text: Very forgiving, shaft is a little too light for me. The package arrived very good. This is a good start if you are not ready to pay +$500 USD.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Mauricio Bogaert

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get my new driver out on the course. However today, on my second time on the course this season, upon teeing off on the 4th hole, the shaft just split in half. I hit the ball well, but on my follow through heard the shaft splitting in half. My buddies watching were all shocked, citing never having seen a club snap like that at the shaft. Will never buy a Taylor Made club again if that’s what I’m to expect in the terms of quality. For a $200 club, I would expect more in terms of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Papa-G

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight, nice driver.
customer_reviews.text: Upon first swings, this baby is light as a feather. If you want distance, your going to have to give it a good back swing to get some power. This driver is designed to be swung fast. If you have a slow swing, I would suggest something else. It seems to be a forgiving driver, as I have hit some high toe shots that still go straight 200 plus yards. Love the black finish and looking at it in my hands. Overall it’s a transition from other drivers, but it feels nice so far. Swing fast, and this puppy is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a consistent club
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 7 months before shaft broke where my left hand rests. Was a stiff flex but reacted like a regular flex. Had a small sweet spot and if you missed it you were 25 yards or more short of a decent shot. Owned the Taylormade RBZ 2nd generation and it was a much more consistent club...going back to it now.
customer_reviews.author: Craig N.

customer_reviews.title: The bees knees
customer_reviews.text: Awesome driver for the price. If your swinging correctly, sends em nice and straight. The responsive “ping” is oh so sweet on this.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed a new driver. His old one would hit hard but was very inaccurate. With this one he can hit and know where the ball will end up. Great product and always happy with Taylor Made.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Warren

customer_reviews.title: Solid reliable driver at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a reasonably forgiving driver. I actually bought this driver on a whim after testing a lot of the more expensive ones at golf galaxy. I thought before I spend a lot more money I figured I’d give this one a shot. I’m glad I did, it is perfect for me. I ordered 10.5 deg, stiff shaft. It is a forgiving club for a mid to high handicapper. The tool and headcover were included as part of the package, I had read other reviews that stated they were not present.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect club for any golfer
customer_reviews.text: great club for the money. its a great value. adjust the launch angel, customize to your swing and your game. Great club to increase your joy of the game
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it one time. Will take some time to get used to it. Sets up great. Great senior club. Lightweight. Hit several nice shots with it. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Beerman

customer_reviews.title: Very forgiving but long distance club
customer_reviews.text: I bought the graphite club and have used it many times. It's forgiving and gives long distance without over swinging
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Melone

customer_reviews.title: Great driver!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this driver. Has added distance and accuracy to my drives. Fantastic value as well. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Didnt love it
customer_reviews.text: Too light face is not as well constructed as previous years, not forgiving distance was not as good as previous model
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Appears to have been used before receipt.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this club, but it appears to have been used when I received it. Returned and ordered a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: MPK

customer_reviews.title: TaylorMade RBZ Driver
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a club that is as good as any $400 driver. Looks great and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last summer. What a difference it has made. No more slice, more distance and this is without putting much power behind my swings. There has been no negatives that I see with this driver. Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Yancy J Tryon

customer_reviews.title: Best value !!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best value drivers I’ve ever had. First hit 250 yard dead straight. This driver has massively improved my game. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ros

customer_reviews.title: looks nice
customer_reviews.text: winter here .. its a new old driver ... just what I ordered .. we'll see ...
customer_reviews.author: Maynard S Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Good until it breaks
customer_reviews.text: I used it about 10 rounds and something busted in the head and there is a rattling inside the head now and it has lost all of it pop. I can hit my 3 wood longer than this club now. It hit great when it wasn’t broke though.
customer_reviews.author: Derrike Johns

customer_reviews.title: Solid club but no miracles
customer_reviews.text: I have hit range balls and one full round. Good club, did actually seem to help off the tee. But no miracles, so mis-hits and pulls still present. Worth the investment, but a lesson would probably have helped my game more.
customer_reviews.author: David Wylie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I hit this driver straighter and longer than my 500$ driver . Great driver would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey hunter brooks

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't believe it
customer_reviews.text: Head cracked second time out. I don't ever remember a club self destructing on me before.
customer_reviews.author: TOM MCMILLIN

customer_reviews.title: May work but not new technology
customer_reviews.text: It’s old technology but was implied to be a improved model— it hits very soft as setup! It may hit ok after adjusting! I waited too late to return it—
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No loft adjustment tool.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, solid driver for the price. However no loft adjustment tool was provided, will look to purchase elsewhere next time.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Graves

customer_reviews.title: Great Club for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value in this easy to hit Driver..... quick turn around...highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: James Francis McHugh

customer_reviews.title: Straight bombs
customer_reviews.text: I suck at golf. Maybe 30 handicap. Last two times i played 6+ shots lower than my old driver.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Mes

customer_reviews.title: in use
customer_reviews.text: changed my driving accuracy, good club, moved up from 10.5 degrees to, 12.5 degrees
customer_reviews.author: Tony L

customer_reviews.title: Affordable fairly forgiving driver
customer_reviews.text: Long, straight, and forgiving. Priced well, should probably be a little cheaper considering an M2 is only fifty more dollars. I replaced the original thin and cheap grip with a GP MCC and am very happy with this club.
customer_reviews.author: Zach L.

customer_reviews.title: Distance
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely satisfied hitting the ball better than expected and smoking it down the fairway
customer_reviews.author: Gina salvo

customer_reviews.title: Great club
customer_reviews.text: I’m still not ready for the PGA but it has nothing to do with the club.
customer_reviews.author: K. Quigley

customer_reviews.title: A great driver
customer_reviews.text: This is one driver that lives up to it’s hype. I hit it 15 yards further with a straight to soft draw.
customer_reviews.author: Steve McEllis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for casual golfers!
customer_reviews.text: What a great bargain! And it cured my wicked slice!
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for the hubs
customer_reviews.text: He LOVES it! Great deal compared to some other more expensive drivers online.
customer_reviews.author: PAIGE

customer_reviews.title: Great club -don’t expect it to make you a pro
customer_reviews.text: The club met all of my expectation and as with all my clubs any issues are user errors
customer_reviews.author: John F. Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s hot. Hitting about 20 yards farther. Definitely get the correct shaft for your swing.
customer_reviews.author: mattnlisa

customer_reviews.title: The best affordable Driver
customer_reviews.text: This is the best driver in regards to quality-price, excellent distance and forgiveness!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great driver at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable loft and feel of the club are well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: David Brett

customer_reviews.title: Buy It Now
customer_reviews.text: Amazing driver. Great price. Solid buy. Easy to adjust. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: landon mcguire

customer_reviews.title: Added distance and accuracy!
customer_reviews.text: I never used the driver; now I can't wait. This club is very forgiving and makes golf fun again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gioioso

customer_reviews.title: Golf Driver RBZ Taylor Made
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old RBZ White Driver with this new version. It feels great and I seem to have more precision with it. And a with a great price in Amazon. Didn't have to spend over $500 for a 2019 model.
customer_reviews.author: ALEX A.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this driver after reading the reviews because most reviews are good. I know I took a chance buying this club before trying it out but I am disappointed in the performance. The ball feels dead coming off the clubhead.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Crap product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this driver 3 months ago. Today it simply exploded while I was practicing. Please do NOT buy anything else from this supplier unless you are looking for a very bad experience. CRAP product.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Augusto Duva

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Head snapped off in box. Product does not work. Beware do not purchase
customer_reviews.author: C. Doan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Driver for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just received this new driver and it's fantastic, well weighted, large sweet spot and great overall.
customer_reviews.author: Paula O

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Good Driver
customer_reviews.text: This driver immediately helped my golf game from my older Taylormade. Great choice for the value especially if you don’t need to have max adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great performance at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Great driver with good velocity and accuracy. A great option without paying for the super high-end drivers.
customer_reviews.author: JAB_LV

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it’s probably fake
customer_reviews.text: Used it once. It started making a crackling after the hit. I brought it to a shop and they said it’s broken inside. There’s no way to return.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Robbins

customer_reviews.title: This is the Notorious RBZ driver
customer_reviews.text: This is a great club. I started with a lower end starter driver and with this, I added 10 to 15 yards to my drives.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Broke on Second Time Out
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this, played two games of golf with it and the shaft snapped on the second time through. I hit about 10 balls with it before it snapped clean in half and the head went flying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than the M series.
customer_reviews.text: I get good distance from this inexpensive driver. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: George Taniguchi

customer_reviews.title: Great Driver!
customer_reviews.text: Was hitting about 240 with my old driver. This club is pushing about 255-260. Sounds great too!
customer_reviews.author: Robert O'Camb

customer_reviews.title: That they do their best to try to make the customer happy
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of the club nice features but regular Flex is way too flimsy do you make this in a stiff graphite shaft or a steel shaft right-handed
customer_reviews.author: Clayton D.

customer_reviews.title: USED not NEW.  Major Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how it hits but very disappointed. Arrived with dirt on the bottom and ball marks on the face. Not new as sold. MAJOR DISAPPOINTMENT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Greg & Stephanie Dozier

customer_reviews.title: Broken Shaft at Head, 6 months old, Used about 20 times
customer_reviews.text: Broken Shaft at Head, 6 months old, Used about 20 times
customer_reviews.author: michael s.

customer_reviews.title: Shaft broke the second day I had it.
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine until the shaft snapped in two on the second day I had it. I didn't hit the ground with it either, it just broke.
customer_reviews.author: D. D. Henning

customer_reviews.title: love this club
customer_reviews.text: I hit the new driver today and I love it. Hit my drives straight wit more consistency. Love the way it sounds
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great club
customer_reviews.text: This driver has a ton of pop. Love the look as it lies behind the ball and the sound at strike is perfect. Great club for the price
customer_reviews.author: caroline mulhollon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hit!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hit forgiving jumps of the clubface. Hit 30 yds further than my other driver. Grateful driver for high handicappers.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Barnwell

customer_reviews.title: Head cover missing.
customer_reviews.text: I did not get a head cover for this driver it should have came with one also did not get the adjustment tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Payne

customer_reviews.title: Lousey quality
customer_reviews.text: It has a crack in the head after 3 uses
customer_reviews.author: James Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Good club for a woman with a slower swing speed
customer_reviews.text: This club didn't work for me but my wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Very satisfied wife

customer_reviews.title: It's not the club it's the player!
customer_reviews.text: It's not the products fault it's the guy holding the club. It's a great driver, but I don't hit it any longer than I do any other driver.
customer_reviews.author: JMichaelP

customer_reviews.title: Quality Driver
customer_reviews.text: Crushing my drives now. 270+ each and every time dead straight. Excellent driver for all skill levels.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Durability is a major question mark
customer_reviews.text: Great driver before the shaft snapped like a twig right outside my return window
customer_reviews.author: Thaddeus Marckesano

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Very forgiving on miss hits and added 30 yards to my drives
customer_reviews.author: Brett speakman

customer_reviews.title: hit the ball straight
customer_reviews.text: I picked up 20 yards on my drives and hit the ball straight more consistently.
customer_reviews.author: ascroggi31

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Used for a couple of weeks,seems to be holding up quite well,love the loft adjustment
customer_reviews.author: Dan Raduns

customer_reviews.title: Great DRIVER!
customer_reviews.text: Great driver, and reasonable price. Perfect grip. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The thing gooooeesss
customer_reviews.text: Perfect club!!! I crank that thing 330-360 off the tee!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew parisi

customer_reviews.title: Forgiving Deiver
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use - very forgiving and large sweet spot
customer_reviews.author: Savas

customer_reviews.title: Fkexability
customer_reviews.text: My son who is my golfer fir 25 years loved it 💜
customer_reviews.author: debbie rice

customer_reviews.title: Great driver
customer_reviews.text: Great driver for golfers not looking for a lot of bells and whistles. Hits straight and long. Very pleased with this club.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Murphy

product_meta.title: TaylorMade Men's RBZ Black Driver, Black
product_meta.description: TaylorMade Men's RBZ Black DriversA New RBZ Driver With Aggressive Styling And Powerful PerformanceRBZ is back with the TaylorMade RBZ Black driver. This generation features a new, aggressive style and powerful performance. The large titanium club head is 460cc for maximum playability and confidence at address. An Ultralite titanium core strategically moves weight to the perimeter of the club head for more forgiveness as well as higher launch and greater control. TaylorMade also includes their revolutionary Speed Pocket to promote higher launch and less spin to increase distance. Put it all together and you get incredible performance with a legendary name in golf with the TaylorMade RBZ Black driver.Features: * Ultralite titanium core strategically places mass to achieve higher launch and greater trajectory control * Legendary Speed Pocket in the sole of the club to promote higher launch and reduce spin for even more distance * New satin black finish with details on crown to improve alignment * Adjustable loft sleeve lets you customize launch and trajectory to your preference * Includes head cover TaylorMade Men's RBZ Black Driver Shaft Information Matrix White Tie 55 Flex Weight Torque Launch Senior 53g 4.2A Mid-High Regular 55g 4.2A Mid-High Stiff 57g 4.1A Mid
feature_bullets: A large, 460cc Titanium head with an adjustable loft sleeve allows for optimized launch and trajectory
Ultralite Titanium core strategically positions mass for higher launch and trajectory control
Premium matrix White tie 55 shaft for maximum distance and smooth feel
Legendary speed pocket performance for high launch and low spin, resulting in more distance
New satin black finish with elegant detailing to improve alignment
